-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

|- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(cxp(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wb(wss(cima(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c3)))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Membership relation for the values of a function whose image is a subclass. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
